Industry, Innovation and Infrastructure.reason: Indirectly related through 社會住宅 and 醫療基礎設施, but not a focus.

Responsible Consumption and Production.reason: No mention of consumption or production sustainability in relation to aging.

Life Below Water.reason: No content on marine ecosystems or related issues.
